title: These Photos of John Cena With Kids Prove He's Really Just a Big Teddy Bear at Heart
text:
John Cena's Cutest Pictures With Kids These Photos of John Cena With Kids Prove He's Really Just a Big Teddy Bear at Heart January 30, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 These Photos of John Cena With Kids Prove He's Really Just a Big Teddy Bear at Heart 
Throughout his time in the spotlight, John Cena has shared a slew of adorable moments with kids. In addition to holding the title for the most wishes granted by a celebrity for the Make-A-Wish Foundation, the WWE wrestler always makes sure to show children extra love during meet-and-greets and appearances, giving us yet another reason to love him . Prepare to smile until your cheeks hurt at the cutest moments John has shared with kids. Related:
